website_summaries.verdict: Bluetooth tracker that helps locate keys through a phone app. Techies will love this one.
pros: Tile is thin and easily attaches to key ring
Works in reverse: if you can't find your phone, double click the tile and your phone automatically rings
cons: Tracks your location – a possible privacy issue

customer_reviews.title: Location must be turned on permanently
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was a brilliant idea for keeping track of keys, etc. But the app has a tragic flaw. It only works if location services are turned to always, even thought when traveling out of wifi range, this puts a huge load on the phone battery (you use a mobile app to find out where your keys are). Since adding this app, and activating my tile, my battery life has shot down. If I change location services to "when using the app" it tells me that my tile has been disabled. This needs to be fixed--much of the time we don't need our locations tracked since the tile is immobile, or we know exactly where the object is.
customer_reviews.author: Rowena G. Matthews

customer_reviews.title: unable to set up, even with customer support help
customer_reviews.text: Ordered to use with his and hers keys and iphone. Tried valiantly to set up with instructions on app, then chatted with customer support for an hour. No relief. They are either defective or the setup is beyond my capacity.(I am a graduate engineer, somewhat computer savvy and usually able to make stuff like this work) Unsatisfactory product.
customer_reviews.author: J and G G

customer_reviews.title: Not a GPS
customer_reviews.text: I bought these tiles in a four pack expecting that I could use them like a GPS tracker. All I found was once you’re disconnected from your phone it’s gone. If you lose your keys in public and have no clue where to start looking you will never find them. If you’re looking for a GPS tracking device, this is not it
customer_reviews.author: robert riessle

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Seemed to barely work then stopped working in less than a month. So unimpressed.
customer_reviews.author: J Fox

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: They don't work don't waste your money turn the phone on turn the phone off turn Wi-Fi on turn Wi-Fi off turn Bluetooth on turn Bluetooth off sometimes it rings sometimes it doesn't so frustrating
customer_reviews.author: Judi A. Baxter

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: Not useful if you actually lose something while out and about......only if it’s in your house. You have to be within a certain distance to find it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennie Wermers

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product management.
customer_reviews.text: 0/2 on delivery. I ordered the 4 pack (2 slim and 2 mates) and only got 1 of the small mates. Got a replacement shipped and same thing 1 of the small mates. Currently trying to get this straightened out.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Paynter

customer_reviews.title: Dead after less than 2 months; waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Tile makes it extremely difficult to contact their customer support when you are having technical issues with your Tile device. I have the Mate 2020 and it won't ring my phone, no matter what I try. I've checked all the settings and followed all the troubleshooting on Tile's website-- still doesn't work. I've been trying for days to get in touch with their customer support and all I can get is automated email responses with the same troubleshooting tips that are on their website. Not a great experience from a customer service POV. I probably won't continue to use this. UPDATE: battery is dead after less than 2 months of use. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: JTown

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was expecting.
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving it 2 stars because it constantly gave false locations. Plus the lack of a true gps feature kind of makes these very limited in their range. The app is better than some of the others I've tried out though. I will wait till they improve this technology. Poorly designed
customer_reviews.author: jd

customer_reviews.title: coudln't make my phone ring when it was literally 10 ft away, says it has a 200ft reach
customer_reviews.text: ive been having problems trying to locate stuff with this, first time it was my keys. I went into the app and pressed the locate device, says it couldnt be located, i found they keys in my bag across my dining table which is not even 5ft away. The second time was for it to ring my phone. I double presssed they charm in my keys and my phone wont ring, so i used my echo show instead to call it , the phone was right across the hall on my computer table 10ft away from where i double pressed the charm, super displeased. consider returning.
customer_reviews.author: Pardomuan M.

customer_reviews.title: What a scam!
customer_reviews.text: This product may work fine, but I am very upset that there is a monthly fee. I would think that paying this much for a finder should be all-inclusive. I am sending it back. I am tired of buying apps & being charged monthly too!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Barr

customer_reviews.title: Best thing EVER!!
customer_reviews.text: I don't lose things THAT often, but when I do, I'm glad I have my tiles! I've lose my wallet once while traveling, and was able to find it quickly before it got swiped up. I've misplaced my keys a few times and Tile is always to the rescue. And perhaps the best part is that it'll quickly help me find my phone so I don't have to go to a computer and find it. I have them on my keys, in my wallet, on all of my remote controls, and my wife has them all over! Love my tiles!
customer_reviews.author: John Goodman

customer_reviews.title: Good App And tiles
customer_reviews.text: I just use these things to find my wallet, flashlights and keys when I lose them around the house And estate. I do not use the app as the manufacturer requests. The app requested me to always leave my phone Attached by Bluetooth to these which drain the battery of my phone quickly. It will yours too. Just set it so it connects by Bluetooth to the tiles when you're looking for them and you will be OK. These are a good idea for an airhead like me.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Buck Too

customer_reviews.title: Defective product and incompetent customer service
customer_reviews.text: The tile won't connect to the app. I contacted Tile customer service, who instructed to press the button once. The press the button twice, then take a video of me pressing the button, which Tile customer service apparently does not have the ability to view. Then they wanted me to provide them with a copy of my receipt. Despite my asking, they could not tell me how the video or the receipt will help them solve my problem. They did not actually want to help me solve the problem. So the product may be fine, but if you have trouble with it, expect to be exasperated. Definitely not worth my time or money.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: WASTE OF MONEY! HORRIBLE!
customer_reviews.text: Will not stop disconnecting every 3 days! It’s so annoying! This product is only good if you’re 100ish FEET AWAY FROM YOUR ITEMS! That means if the tile is not in the same room as you you’ll not be able to find your keys! An absolute waste of money! THIS Breaks really easily IT WILL NOT WORK AFTER BEING DROPPED A LITTLE BIT IN WATER FOR A COUPLE OF SECONDS! STAY AWAY!
customer_reviews.author: Andy Zheng

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working in less than a month
customer_reviews.text: The first-time setup worked fine. Stopped connecting to the phone and I removed the tile from the app and reinstalled the app. It's gone, can't add it anymore. Insisted and had a message "This is already associated with another account", but it's my account, no way to recover
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable
customer_reviews.text: I bought the set of four. Set up is fairly easy. My biggest issue is the connection time when locating a tile. I use a Samsung S8 phone. I have had one of the tiles in my pocket and the app will struggled to connect to the tile less than 2 feet from the phone. I actually lost a key on a bike ride once. Lucky for me I knew where I probably lost it. I back tracked and activated the software. I actually spotted the tile before the tile responded to the phone. I really want this tech but I don't really feel I can trust it.
customer_reviews.author: James GrimmTop Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: The more you use it, the more annoying it gets!
customer_reviews.text: Every single time you use the app, you have to suffer. First, there's 15 seconds of clicking away the pop-up ads for "upgrade", and pop-ups to switch on "Location Access". There is no way to set your preferences permanently. 24/7 location tracking is unnecessary and runs down your battery. The 2nd thing is that while you can customize the sound alert that the tile broadcasts, ALL selections are whimsical ringtones. Once you finally reach your lost item, it's too late... the stupid ringtone is stuck in your head!
customer_reviews.author: Randal Miller

customer_reviews.title: Exceptionally disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I totally had in mind that I could put this in my truck and if someone was to steal it I would be able to track them. That is not what this is at all. It only works when it is within Bluetooth range of your Phone. Very disappointing. I mean really? If I'm within 15' of it I can probably find it without a tile. Absolutely useless for what I need it for
customer_reviews.author: Michael krohn

customer_reviews.title: Tile 4 pack.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these to replace my older non replaceable battery tiles. I previously had the waterproof tile sports and they worked great. Setup was easy and are very nice to have when they work. These have been hit or miss when I hit the locate button. Sometimes they don’t work at all or other times it takes a minute for it to work. We will see in the long run how they work. And yes I have tried refreshing my Bluetooth and the app it always open so that is not the issue. When they do work it is super convenient and helps you locates anything they are attached too.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Not so much
customer_reviews.text: Really wanted to like these. Our intent was to go on the cat's collars. On;y worked when the cats were in the house, there was no range, couldn't even detect them in the yard half the time. Cute idea but for $70 they need to work better. Iretuend them.
customer_reviews.author: Christinexoxodillon

customer_reviews.title: Tiles work great- slims not no great
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, but the slims rarely work. I gave the slims to my sons, and both placed them in their wallets- one is used with a Samsung phone, and the other to IPhone. Both boys have issues with the slim alerting their phones and vice versa. The tiles work great for my keys and one of my sons. No issues with the tiles at all- just issues with the slims. I was disappointed, Tiles came highly recommended, took a chance on the slims. I would not buy again!
customer_reviews.author: RSinIDAHO

customer_reviews.title: When they are connected, it works great, but if you are not, you are still running around.
customer_reviews.text: Perhaps this is a fault of bluetooth radio waves being it was meant for short range? But I find it that my phone or anyone else's phone in my family, have a hard time connecting to a tile. It would not find it and you basically start walking around the house trying and hoping that it will get close enough that it will get connected. Once its connected THEN it works wonders, it saved me couple of minutes by having it ring. But before connecting, I find myself still running around the house looking for my keys like I had before having a tile attached to it. So it works, kinda?
customer_reviews.author: B. Law

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: I just found out about this product. I had kept my landline and paid $20 per month with it unplugged most of the time to avoid telemarketers. I hated to take it out and then be unable to find my phone when no one was home besides me. I always had someone call it. When I found out about this, I said I must have it. Now a couple of taps on the tile makes my phone ring (even if on vibrate) OR I can use my phone to find my keys with the TILE attached. I absolutely think this is the handiest thing invented lately!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Hickman

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this so my 80 yr old mother could find her keys and phone (we looked for them 4x in the same day). Easy to set up. Easy to operate. Mom has called me a couple times to report she has used it with success. Granted, she's misplaced both keys and phone in her own home 🤣🤣, so we have yet to test it's veracity out in the world, but that is for another day.
customer_reviews.author: SUSAN P.

customer_reviews.title: Works well at first and then quickly stops working
customer_reviews.text: I bought a Tile in March and was excited since I misplace my phone daily. It worked really well initially. We have a 4000 sq foot home and if I clicked on the Tile and my phone was upstairs my phone would ring. However, in July it often started to not respond to my pushing the button. I chalked this up to a low battery and got a new one. Now I can stand there LOOKING at my phone and press the Tile and it goes to that default noise like "I couldn't find it." It's so frustrating to buy something and have it only work for such a short period of time.
customer_reviews.author: KSSC

customer_reviews.title: Great for dogs & cats!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love that they changed these to replaceable batteries. I use these on all my dogs & it's come in handy more than once with one of my escape artists. I forgot to remove them from the dog's collars when they swam in the lake but they ended up being just fine.
customer_reviews.author: dbjarnarson

customer_reviews.title: I’ll evaluate this product 3 times before purchasing
customer_reviews.text: Premium feature is a lie, you cannot “easily” connect into 2 different phones one account. Getting a hold off an agent over a chat which is only sharing FAQ and not really helping you to fix the issue, impossible to contact them over the phone, and using a passive aggressiveness which is not nice to receive as a client. This is completely my personal opinion and case which I used the product for no more than 5 hours, and it’s already in process of returning.
customer_reviews.author: Edu Drack

customer_reviews.title: Good luck finding anything with this thing
customer_reviews.text: The range on this thing is awful. Got it mainly because I’m constantly misplacing my phone and it keys, but when I try to sound off either the device just beeps for about 30 seconds while walking around my house before playing the “I give up sound”. You’d be better off just using the tracking feature most phones have nowadays. Overpriced plastic keychain
customer_reviews.author: PhantomTiger105

customer_reviews.title: It’s a necessity!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to purchase one of these, because of the mixed reviews. Also, I didn’t want to be, “that guy”. Though, I will admit, I’m glad that I am. I’ve had it only for a few days, and I misplaced my bag yesterday... it had my wallet, laptop, iPad mini, and a few other things in it. I was panicked. Fortunately, though, I remembered that I put the tile in my front pocket of my bag, so when I went to go ping it with my phone I, immediately, found it... in my living room, on my couch. So, just imagine if it were anywhere else... If I have any issues in the future, I’ll update the review.
customer_reviews.author: Christian White

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for my purpose
customer_reviews.text: The product description neglected to state that the tile mate only works when you lose your tile near someone else who has the tile and tile app on their phone and their Bluetooth is active. It does not work any other way. If you lose it away from your home which defeats the purpose of trying to find your keys and you’re not home. I thought it would work like a GPS you can see it on the map but that’s not home this tile mate works. Should be clearly stated in the product description. Returned it
customer_reviews.author: Jetlag Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Pretty awesome tool
customer_reviews.text: I gave these to a few people in the family that I know lose their wallet often. It is pretty cool. I kept one for myself so I will be putting it to the test and update the review once I have had a good amount of time using it. Update: You have to pay to get the beta Smart Alerts. It will be cool when it is perfected but currently it is not super accurate. You have to keep the app open at all times for it to properly track your tiles. I wish this was something you could enable to happen in the background.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Sibley

customer_reviews.title: Pretty much worthless
customer_reviews.text: This used to be a great product. I don’t know what happened but I’m on my third and they do not work at all. I’ll ring my keys from my phone while they are both in my hands and it doesn’t even acknowledge they keys are there. Same with the keys ringing the phone. It’s basically completely useless. Can’t find my keys and now I know I just have to keep looking because the tile is no help. I’m so disappointed because when I first got one a couple of years ago, I was a huge fan. But I’m hesitant to buy a fourth in the hopes that maybe this one will work.
customer_reviews.author: J Farley

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up. So far they work well. I did have some trouble w the card tile due to the RFID in my wallet. The signal became hit or miss so I ust bought a new wallet without RFID and everything is great now. I also put the other card in my import docs file and passport. The square tiles I put on my keys and one in my purses inside zip pocket. All work great!
customer_reviews.author: XcrackyX

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My only phone is a cell phone which I constantly misplace in the house. The Tile is great for finding my phone. Walls are a little difficult for the Tile to penetrate so I walk down the hall clicking the tile and I always find my phone. I chose the Tile as I read it has the loudest ring. I am very satisfied with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Dean

customer_reviews.title: collecting dust
customer_reviews.text: Toy. Not worth the waisted 40 mins of set up time. Well to be honest I gave up after 40 mins of nonsense. Log in to play store, download app, run, wait for code to be sent to email. Why is any of this necessary? I bought your product, gave you my money why do you need to know who I am, again? Why does it matter my location, its not gps ready? Its a Bluetooth device. Download app, connect to device. 70 dollars down the drain, save your money unable to give ease of use a negative number
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Dillon

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work all that well
customer_reviews.text: The tile is a great concept with very poor execution. I bought the 4 pack and put them on several keys and in a wallet. Even when I am within 5 feet of the keys, the app will only allow me to find them about 1 in 5 times. The other 4 it says it's out of range. This applies to all 4 of my tiles. The only thing that I do like about the app is that it has always been able to locate my phone no matter what which is a nice convenience. Honestly I am probably going to take the tiles back off my keys as it is not worth having.
customer_reviews.author: chad helms

customer_reviews.title: Gives me peace at mind
customer_reviews.text: Recently lost my wallet and I’m always losing my keys. Maybe these will help me keep track of them. App does an amazing job of tracking where you go and where you’ve been. I’m giving it a 4 star because; You have to pay extra to get certain abilities on the app and you have to leave the app running at all times in the background. If you swipe the app away, it will notify you that the app has closed and is no longer tracking you tiles.
customer_reviews.author: Devin Blake Holley

customer_reviews.title: Truly madly deeply &Sadly disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Is convieneint when it actually works. But getting it to actually work is another story. I can be standing right next to it or in the other room and it takes 2 or 3 minutes to connect only to tell me its not in range. Which is kind of ironic because when someone is running around looking for their keys and cant find them they're likely running late already & the last thing they want to do is wait 2 or 3 minutes only to tell you it's not in range further reminding you what a waste of $ the stupid thing was. Customer service is nonexistant. No phone # and no email to contact them. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Disconnected my device, added someone else's device
customer_reviews.text: Woke this morning to an email from Tile that my keys were found in a town 30 miles away. I found them in his room...in my house. I thought it was strange that it said "keys" and not "Name's keys" as they were named in the app but didn't really pay attention until after I found the keys. I tried re-adding the "Name's keys" to my app but the Tile Mate will not make the "happy tune". Battery is 100%. Very unhappy.
customer_reviews.author: mom of c and c

customer_reviews.title: USELESS if you want to find your PHONE!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm using the Tile Mate for my keys/phone. If I lose my keys, I can find with the Tile app in my phone. Great! But I never misplace my keys. I'm always misplacing my phone. Unfortunately the Tile will only ring the phone if the Tile app on your phone is open & running when you happen to misplace your phone. UTTERLY USELESS TO ME!!! COMPLETE WASTE OF MONEY!
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Hit and Miss with Alexa
customer_reviews.text: This works great with the app, but it’s hit and miss with Alexa. It’s like I have to get the phrasing *just right* to actually get her to ring my keys or phone, and even then she sometimes has trouble. It’s not that big of a deal, I’d still recommend this. Just know that it might take a while to get it to work properly with Alexa. (I’ve read that you have to rename your keys or phone in the app, and then ask Alexa to find them using that specific name. Having done this, it’s still hit and miss.)
customer_reviews.author: Anne A.

customer_reviews.title: Great devices, great sizes
customer_reviews.text: I put one slim in the case of my kindle, one in my journal, and a original onto my earbud case. I find myself far less stressed about losing these items. My recommendation for the company is to add a battery health notification to the app.
customer_reviews.author: ellsea

customer_reviews.title: Works great if you're pretty close to your device, but watch out for your phone battery
customer_reviews.text: I've been using tile for years now, and these new tile mate's work just as advertised. They are louder than the originals and seem to have slightly better range. The addition of the replaceable battery means that this should last much longer into the future. Unfortunately, be prepared to see a pretty big dip in your phone's battery life, as it needs to be using location services constantly in the background to work with the tile app.
customer_reviews.author: Kokorone

customer_reviews.title: Forgetfulness Solved
customer_reviews.text: I can now keep track of all my things! My poor friends and family are constantly helping me find things, but thankfully, tiles are helping me instead and giving them a break. Easy to follow instructions included, and nice, clean packaging. App is intuitive and I love that other people with the tile app can help me find my stuff without doing anything. The tiles are loud as well, so it’s usually easy for me to locate my things.
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzie

customer_reviews.title: Improved! But not perfect...
customer_reviews.text: Definitely an improvement to previous non-removable battery design. Great battery life, and you can replace the battery easily rather than toss-and-replace. However, it works half of the time. I loss my keys a lot, and also my phone. Hypothetical, if I find one I can find the other. However, half of the time I search for my keys, it takes so long to connect I usually find my keys before it can. However, find my keys faster half of the time is better that none of the time.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Update* downgrading to 2 stars. I got this for Christ 2019. It is now March. The longer I have this, the less often is works. Super unreliable. update* Every once in a while, it doesn't connect to my phone. I'm really nervous I'll lose my keys at a time when it won't connect, but so far that hasn't happened yet. If you lose your phone or keys often, you NEED this haha.
customer_reviews.author: lizzie.latour

customer_reviews.title: Delivers on its promise
customer_reviews.text: But don't turn off the Bluetooth service on your phone - ever - if you ever want to try and find the phone with the fabs. Other than that (power drain) it is a great utility. I lost the Key-Fab to our car. It cost us $250 to replace it and re code the car. Guess what our neighbor found in his garden a week later? If we had a Tile on them, there is every reason to believe we would have found them!
customer_reviews.author: Yoel Ben-Avraham

customer_reviews.title: A hit for almost the whole family (read)
customer_reviews.text: I picked this up as a gift for my son, my parents and myself for Christmas because we all constantly misplace things-namely our keys. The 4 pack was perfect. On Christmas the folks came over and opened theirs and that's when I find out that they've been sharing a set of keys because my mom misplaced hers LOL! So, when she finds her set she'll attach her tile. I've atleast secured the findability of their remaining set for now!
customer_reviews.author: JJJWJJSD

customer_reviews.title: Great idea for tracking, best when many people keep app running to help track
customer_reviews.text: Great concept for finding lost items. I've never needed to locate a lost item, but love the concept. Not quite sure where to place the tile, especially if using to find a stolen item. Relies on other users to keep app running to locate lost items. I keep app running in background on my phone with minimal battery usage.
customer_reviews.author: JD WDC

customer_reviews.title: Super handy!
customer_reviews.text: 1000000% recommend- the app is easy to use and my boyfriend loses his wallet all the time. You can also double click on the key one to find your phone which is cool too tbh
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: A little buggy but okay
customer_reviews.text: Overall I do like this GPS tracker. I use it for my 2 dogs, keys and wallet. It's not very loud and having a wallet like mine the most secure part is deep inside and it's hard to hear. I could not use the locate or tracking features for the first month of having bought this. Also the 30 a year for pro is a RIP off.
customer_reviews.author: William gibbs

customer_reviews.title: Can reverse locate your phone!
customer_reviews.text: The one thing that really pleased me is once you install The Tile app you can double tap on the little Tile Mate or Tile Slim and your phone will alert with a loud sound. (I set The Tile sound on loud.) The alert signal can be heard all the way across the house. You do not have to but a Tile on your phone to do this.
customer_reviews.author: Sher Smiles

customer_reviews.title: Not working with Siri...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I saw an ad saying that they integrate with Siri. I can find the tiles and ring the tiles from the Tile app, but so far, I've had very little luck getting them to work with Siri. I set up the Siri shortcuts, but I get various error messages every time I try to find a tile using Siri from my iPhone or Apple watch. :(
customer_reviews.author: Matt Sears

customer_reviews.title: A good help
customer_reviews.text: I have a huge bag so sometimes I’ll forget where I put my keys or they’ll somehow get lost in my bag. I know it sounds weird but trust me, I’m not the only one this happens to. Having this tile mate made it so much easier for me when I’m trying to rush into my apartment! The battery life so far has been good, although I haven’t had it for that long.
customer_reviews.author: Donna L.

customer_reviews.title: Work great - not too big!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son and daughter-in-law for their keys! They are notorious for losing their vehicle keys! My son set them up in a few minutes and so far they are liking them very much. Easy to use and small enough for their keychain. I suggested they put one on our grand daughters school backpack, she is always leaving it somewhere! I may have to buy another set just for her stuff!!
customer_reviews.author: cahunley

customer_reviews.title: Useless Junk - “Out of Range”
customer_reviews.text: Living in a city and having to always street park, I purchased the tile to always remember where my car is located- a feature that Tile markets usage for. The app consistently shows that the tile is “out of range” though. I’ve tried to troubleshoot with variety of forum suggestions and nothing seems to work. Useless piece of junk at this point. Glad it’s for my car and not my wallet or keys... I can usually remember where my car is parked but God forbid I actually lost something... it would be pointless. I threw the packaging away too, so I can’t even return it now. 🙄👎🏻
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: This is all you need
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the specific purpose to attaching it immediately to my AirPods Pro. I always misplace them somewhere in my house but now with the feature to locate them by sound it’s been easier to find them. Also the added feature to locate your phone so it’s a win win. My only request is to able to add custom sound rather than the default.
customer_reviews.author: DeAndre

customer_reviews.title: We've loved this product for years
customer_reviews.text: My wife got one for Christmas three years ago and every year since this has been on her list. This year I noticed they make one with a replaceable battery so I bought her the batteries to go with it and bought one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: LOVE MY TILE
customer_reviews.text: I love my Tile and have used this product for years now. It works perfectly to locate my keys and my phone. I sometimes rush in and suddenly one or the other is missing. I locate my keys by activating the tile on my phone or reverse and locate my phone by activating tile on the keys. Irreplaceable product, I will never be without it again.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Henninger

customer_reviews.title: Worth more than what you pay
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing! Bought my first tile a couple of years ago and couldn’t be happier. Saved me so much time looking for them around the apartment. The comfort to look at last known location like find my iPhone is such a great feature. Never will regret spending the money and the one pack is good for presents!
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: small range
customer_reviews.text: It a good idea but it not a helpful one. Of I leave my keys in my car the and look for it in my house it won't pick it up at all.... The range is very small. So if your like me who lose stuff every where you need something with a bigger range.
customer_reviews.author: honney

customer_reviews.title: It works most of the time when i need it.
customer_reviews.text: I mainly bought it for my parents. My mom isn't that tech savvy and prefers not using it. It works as inteded most of the time. As I was trying to teach my mom how to use it she put the 'lost' device in the drier and as i was looking noticed i didnt hear anything, thays because it doesnt work through metal. but the gps on the phone was telling me i was getting closer.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Crap
customer_reviews.text: Absolute crap. I had tiles last year and they worked great. These new ones I have to be within 10 feet for my phone to find them. I restarted my phone did all the recommended things to resolve this and still it's just junk. Im bummed that this product got big and then fit the trend of more numbers less quality. Do not buy this my friends
customer_reviews.author: Matt Doyle

customer_reviews.title: Not very useful in reality
customer_reviews.text: This seemed like a great idea When I saw them on lightning deal, until I actually purchased and realized there wasn’t much use for them. I ended up returning them. They are only good if you are the type of person who literally loses things around the house bad enough that you need a device to find them because the range is not that far for them to be worth very much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a great buy for teenage daughters who keep losing their keys
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely a good purchase! Bought it for my teenage daughter who keeps losing her keys. Now when she can’t find them, she clicks the button on her phone and she can hear them beeping. Definitely very smart, and durable. Plus you can get different types of cases for more fun. They must have for all teenagers!
customer_reviews.author: MelodyLee

customer_reviews.title: Tile for lost keys
customer_reviews.text: My mechanic put my key fob on the roof of my car and I drove away. The key fob fell of the roof of my car and per the Tile app, my keys are on the 15 freeway. I had the CHP help me look for about 20 minutes and we couldn't locate them. Too many bushes and hilly area.
customer_reviews.author: Christine D. Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: My phone app would NOT ring reliably from the tile devices, even if they were right next to it. Sometimes it would work, but rarely. The other direction, from the phone, to a tile, I got about 20' in my house before the phone couldn't ring the tile on my keychain. Nice idea and I wanted it to work... but no good. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch G

customer_reviews.title: Very reassuring
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I bought it after I lost my wallet to help prevent that happening again. It’s great for peace of mind and makes it easy to get out the door when I’ve misplaced my wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Bec

customer_reviews.title: Range is questionable
customer_reviews.text: Product specs say up to 200 feet. seems kinda questionable. Mine barely connects unless its a foot away...
customer_reviews.author: JonBoy

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. never found the keys. I returned it. Customer service was horrible. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: yankeefan

customer_reviews.title: Key losers rejoice!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and so very helpful for those endless mornings when I'm late for work because I can't seem to find the keys I literally just had in my hands 2 seconds ago. Just downloaded the app and pressed the button. BINGO! All set up. Getting one of these bad boys for all the fellow key losers in my life.
customer_reviews.author: DarlynnJen

customer_reviews.title: Tile plus echo dot
customer_reviews.text: Been using tiles the past 4 years and have always come in handy when locating my keys and other items they are attached to. In the past I had to buy new ones each year but now the new editions have replaceable batteries which is really nice. So far they work just as good and will continue to purchase tiles. A+
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: I love these little Tile Trackers. My mother has Dementia and she spends her day and my time searching for her pocketbook. I put it inside her pocketbook at first but she removed it so I used the key chain holder, bought her a new wallet and attached it to her new purse. It is working out great. No more pocketbook stress for me.
customer_reviews.author: Regina

customer_reviews.title: works great and worth the money
customer_reviews.text: this device works great and does everything it says. use it to find your phone or use your phone to find whatever it is attached to. i have it attached to my car key. it saves me time in looking for my keys. i used to use a ipad mini to find my phone before i left the house but now i can just click the tile to find my phone which also saves me some time. it's not too big and i believe you can buy cute little cases for your tile though i have not done that yet. thank you to the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Love my tilemate
customer_reviews.text: Coming from someone who is always putting my keys or phone somewhere I love my tile mate. The signal volume is loud enough but not obnoxious. I can easily find my phone from my tilemate and my keys from my phone. I am very pleased with the product. Easy to set up and use.
customer_reviews.author: Donna ML

customer_reviews.title: it's like a 2 for 1
customer_reviews.text: The app will tell you were your keys are located AND will ring them so you can hear where they are. Also, if you misplaced your phone in your apt then you can push the tile and it'll make your phone ring. That's a 2-fer! Yea! So simple, so worth it.
customer_reviews.author: KerryChad

customer_reviews.title: I've Kept a Tile in my Medicine Bag for Years
customer_reviews.text: As a disabled person, I need to keep a decent amount of medication on me and my tile has been a comfort for a long time reassuring me that it is with me and helping me find it when I misplace it, it is also wildly helpful with helping me find my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best
customer_reviews.text: Amazon Amazon is really the best ! Best high quality products , good deals, best service I have ever received , usually fast shipping I highly recommend to buy with amazon amazing experience and products Amazon is really the best ! Will buy again :)
customer_reviews.author: A very disappointed customer

customer_reviews.title: Battery Lasted 31⁄2 Months
customer_reviews.text: Great product when it worked. The battery, marketed as lasting 1 year, lasted 3 1⁄2 months. I contacted the seller about the 1 year guarantee, to no avail. I know I can personally buy and install another battery, but that's not the point. The vendor's info is incorrect and they should send me or anyone with this problem, a battery or new tile, and stand behind their claims. Plus it's very difficult, actually impossible right now with the pandemic, to go out and find this battery size.
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia

customer_reviews.title: Don’t settle for the off brand trackers
customer_reviews.text: I’m so glad i got a real tile and not the off brand ones out there selling on Amazon. I had an off brand one initially and it was SO ANNOYING. extremely sensitive if it got pressed on anything. It used to randomly go off in my purse at work non stop and in meetings. This one doesn’t do that and you have a warranty for a limited time which i think it’s pretty good. The longest standing and first of all trackers this is worth the price even though it could definitely be cheaper in my honest opinion
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Rybiy

customer_reviews.title: A game changer
customer_reviews.text: I love this so far. Easy to set up and now I'll always know where my keys and wallet are. If you're out of range, it'll show you the last location it recorded. I think this was definitely worth the price for 2 slims and 2 tiles.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: How Great!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift to hand out for Christmas. Everyone loved them has loved them. They have nothing but good things to say. The one thing everyone has liked is it works two ways. You can use it to locate the item you have it attached to and you can also use it to locate your phone.
customer_reviews.author: Angela J Sessums

customer_reviews.title: Solid Product
customer_reviews.text: People never prepare to protect their most valuable & daily imperative possessions. I drop keys, wallets, & things all the time. Simply because we carry a lot of stuff all the time. Pants pockets are not well designed & things fall out when we sit down in cars, cafes, & at work. Along with a conscious effort to secure our possessions, I have used this product to keep track & find my stuff all the time. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sacha C. Saint-Cyr

customer_reviews.title: Ding Ding
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband because he always loses his keys. He never fails to find his keys now. The app does have to be on in the background on the phone for the tile to ping back to the phone (to find the phone) and for the phone to remember the last location of the item. This uses about 5% of the phone’s battery throughout the charge. I think the device is loud enough. Very compact. Other family members bought this shortly after seeing this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Make Life Easier
customer_reviews.text: I love my Tile. If I have my keys, I can’t find my phone. If I have my phone, I can’t find my keys. Sad thing is, I usually can’t find them because they’re buried in my giant work tote. Tile saves me time in looking for either of them. I just wish the battery life was longer than a year!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah B

customer_reviews.title: Haven’t lost my wallet ONCE
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, this is my second tile devise and my last one lasted a year before I decided To replace it because it was running low on battery. It probably could’ve gone a few weeks longer but I didnt Want to push it. Long story short...if you’re forgetful like me, then this is PERFECT for you. Especially if you’re running late and can’t remember where in the house you put your wallet, just ring it and you will find it no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Nathalie T.

customer_reviews.title: No, I don’t want to pay for Premium features!
customer_reviews.text: Constantly bombarded with trying to sell Premium features. Does not work well. Out of range from basement to upstairs. Just wanted something simple to find my key in the house. Would not purchase again. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: MoInnkeeper

customer_reviews.title: Priorities
customer_reviews.text: Tile Mate turned out to be the culprit that locked my phone into a Disney tune alarm whenever I left home with my key and wallet tiles. Possibly a misunderstanding of the setup of the app? I’ll get around to this one soon, it’s just that I have way too many products that “user friendly “ didn’t seem to be a priority.
customer_reviews.author: ram2k

customer_reviews.title: Not loud enough.
customer_reviews.text: Not loud enough to hear in order to locate. Purchased Pro instead and it was louder, but not loud enough to locate if in pants pocket, in the garage, etc.. Would like to return this purchase, but past the 30 days. I thought Amazon allowed 90 day returns. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Gen

customer_reviews.title: Best thing ever
customer_reviews.text: I've only had it for a few days I've used it at least 10 times. I have one on each side of my car keys and one on the TV remote and one inside my purse. These little things are Lifesavers and I love them
customer_reviews.author: Karenia

customer_reviews.title: Great for keys, not for dogs
customer_reviews.text: It only picks up the signal for my dog when he's within 30 feet or so- otherwise I'm spending my afternoon deep in the weeds looking for that mischievous little scamp, with no help from Tile. It's terrific for keys though!
customer_reviews.author: scubamaki

customer_reviews.title: Dont Buy
customer_reviews.text: I installed the app on my iPhone. I set it up as app described. The sound from the tile could hardly be heard and I was sitting with it in front of me. I tried the find on map. It showed my keys 4 blocks away and they were also sitting right in front of me. It is a total rip off. DONT BUY. 4-20-2020
customer_reviews.author: Bill Burgess

customer_reviews.title: Money Waster
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because sometimes I forget where I left my scanner. I've used it four times and it could only find my scanner once. Two times it told me the scanner was located in about a four block radius. I would check it from time to time and my phone was six inches from the tile and it couldn't locate it.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work very far
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a Christmas gift for my mom who always loses her keys and phone. I love that she can find both with one tile. However she used it a couple days ago and her keys were in her car parked in the driveway and she was inside the garage and it said they were out of range. I guess we'll have to mess with it more because I thought it showed you the location on a map?
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to try this product. Genius idea! I saw this on tiktok and immediately ordered. Never worked correctly. Kept saying "tile not in rage." There was no instructions so I googled why and what I needed to do on my end. Google told me blue tooth was off or I needed to restart. One time my blue tooth was off. But it didn't make a difference because "tile not in range" My son is autistic. This would have been perfect when he leaved our home to make sure I know where he's at IF it would work. Don't waste your money. Does not work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and works
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little item - my son keeps losing his house key and we connected this little tile and now he just presses a button in his phone and it beeps and also shows us when we are getting closer to the keys
customer_reviews.author: dmarie

customer_reviews.title: great with finding your misplaced items and/or your phone
customer_reviews.text: I attached a tile to me keys and now I never lose them. I like that Tile gives u a location history of your item on a map so you can backtrack where you left it. It also has a 2-way alarm feature where u can use your phone to sound the alarm on the tile, and vice-versa use your tile to ring your phone.
customer_reviews.author: Navster

customer_reviews.title: Where is it?
customer_reviews.text: Helps me a lot. I have a lot going on, and sometimes I forget things.
customer_reviews.author: mikw

customer_reviews.title: POS!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I followed the directions to a "T" and neither of the two could see my keys 10' away! they worked in reverse (find my iPhone) but I already have that feature on my phones and pad's Not worth a plumb nickel, Much less + $70.00. Tech support is non-existent.
customer_reviews.author: Gary W. Goodenow

product_meta.title: Tile Mate (2020) - 1-pack
product_meta.description: Size:1 Pack| Style:MateThe updated Tile Mate is a versatile, cost-effective tracker for everyday things. Now with a longer 200 ft range, mate easily attaches to keys, purses or anything else you need to keep track of regularly. Tile requires installation of the Tile App on iOS or Android, registration for a Tile account and acceptance of Tile’s Privacy Policy and Terms of Service (available at Tile.com). Payment required to access additional Premium services.
feature_bullets: The New Tile Mate is our versatile finder for everyday things; ideal for individuals and families who want a cost-effective tracker for multiple items
Ring your things: use your smartphone to make your Tile ring when you misplace your things within 200 ft Bluetooth range
Find your phone: Can't find your phone? Simply double press the Tile button on your Tile to make your phone ring, even when it’s on silent
See it on a map: the Tile app remembers when and where you left something behind

Use community find: if you lose your Tile, you can anonymously recruit the entire Tile community to help you find it; The Tile app running on their phones will send location updates to your app, letting only you know where your Tile Mate is
Battery life: replaceable CR2032 battery is guaranteed for one year from activation; You can easily replace it yourself

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars12,344 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
